snippet: The British utility International Power has rejected a $9.5 billion offer from the French energy giant GDF Suez for the 30 percent stake in the British company that it does not already own.
abstract: The British utility International Power has rejected a $9.5 billion offer from the French energy giant GDF Suez for the 30 percent stake in the British company that it does not already own.

headline.main: British Utility Rejects $9.5 Billion Offer From GDF Suez
